exceptions.exn: In environment server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \ otin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat prec : server_state -> nid -> seq nid -> Prop prec_safe : forall (this to : nat_eqType) (s : server_state) (m : seq nid), HServ this to -> prec s to m -> coh_msg {| content := {| tag := the_tag; tms_cont := m |}; from := this; to := to; active := true |} (current_epoch s) this, to : nid d : dstatelet m : seq nat Hs : HServ this to Unable to unify "true" with "this \\in nodes".
Not an inductive goal with 2 constructors.
The LHS of in_cons (_ \\in _ :: _) does not match any subterm of the goal

original: simpl. unfold server_send_safe. intros [Hs _]. split. - split. + rewrite in_cons. by left. + by rewrite in_cons.
